content.prompt: The writer wants “I have...unsightly creatures” in sentence 10 to convey the reluctant appreciation of mayflies they describe in the third paragraph. Which of the following versions of “I have...unsightly creatures” in sentence 10 most effectively accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: I can now respect these foul creatures
I find myself entranced by these graceful beings
I remain perplexed by these strange and horrid bugs

skill.text: Skill 8.A: Strategically use words, comparisons, and syntax to convey a specific tone or style in an argument.
